A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (If you know bible verses really well this review may contain spoilers)\n\nI am happy to say the movie is thrilling\, unique\, well-acted and\, dare I say it\, spiritually profound. There is a series of scenes\, (if you have seen it you will know which one[s]) that really evokes Matt 24:10-13. No matter how out numbered\, no matter what the odds\, even if the spark seems to be going cold\, long live the Resistance!
